data.name: DYSTOA - VR
data.detailed_description:
Experience the surreal, poetic and minimalistic world of DYSTOA with a new and immerse perspective through VR. DYSTOA is an exploration game as it is an homage to the beauty of life and death and thoughts from one or another world.

All alone in a post-apocalyptic world, fading away into unknown realms you start exploring the archaic city of DYSTOA.

On your way through this world, you will discover obscure secrets and forgotten places while following a trail of lyrical whispers. Many surreal encounters are awaiting you in this vast land. In the end, you will find a truth, but what will be your realization?

HIGHLIGHTS

- story-driven first-person exploration experience
- calm and surreal music and ambience
- very dense and isolated atmosphere to free your mind
- a vast and openly shaped world
- beautiful scenery with intriguing aesthetics
- lyrical pieces will enrich your journey
- hidden places and secrets are waiting to be unfolded


“Don't wake me for the end of the world unless it has very good special effects.” ― Roger Zelazny

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-3770 | AMD FX-8350 | or better
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 980 | AMD Radeon R9 290 | or better
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
